
1. Open file handle (list of files, 1 per line)
2. Count the number of lines in the file
3. Loop through each line and call system(touch $filename) for the file names found on each line

File structure:

the_ccg-the_stem.md

permalink: "/ccgs/the_ccg/the_stem/"

the problem is that for some files we have the structure

the_ccg-the_stem-the_leaf.md

which should render as:

permalink: "/ccgs/the_ccg/the_stem/the_leaf"

Could render the seperator as = in file_list.txt

Or just use a URL list and create file names from the permalink by gsubbing (or pythonic equivalent) in spaces (for title) and hyphens (for filename) in the necessary
